headline: WeRide Attracts Public Investments as Top Funds Back Its Autonomous Mobility Growth
summary: ARK Invest, a leading investment firm managed by Cathie Wood, acquired a total of 858,295 WeRide American Depositary Shares (ADSs) from public markets over the past three trading days, indicating confidence in the company’s growth potential.WeRide’s shareholders now include leading global investment institutions such as Fidelity Management & Research, Greenwoods Asset Management, Hudson Bay Capital, Invesco, M&G, Mirae Asset, Morgan Stanley Investment Management, Temasek and multiple other long-
